title: PROJECT: Skin Bugs
body: So, I have noticed a trend playing against all the new project skins.  I think its a bug because I can not find anything about it elsewhere.  While attacking or not attacking the new poject skins, the seem to periodicly "vanish" for about 1-2 seconds then re-appear somewhere else, or sometimes not at all.  Has anyone else noticed this problem?

replies.body:
Hey kaimedar,

Do you have any additional information or a video of this occurring?

I have seen this too it is to hard to get a screenshot because it is happening during its like 1 seconds the player is right in front of you and the next they are gone and it was not a flash because they are right back in front of you
Is it possible this due to lag?
it could be but i do not think it is its has happen in more then one game and all my game i am running a low ping

Unfortionately, no, I dont have a video of this occuring.  I don't record my playtime anymore since the server transfer to Chicago.  Living on the west coast it makes my playtime in Leagues lag really bad now.
